programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2012
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2012 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep41
programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep8
programme.desc: A Matter Of Life And Bff / Cheer And Present Danger - After her friendship bracelet breaks, Lotta does everything she can to keep her friends. With the holidays months away the girls create their own- Friendship Appreciation Day!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher It! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep41
programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side Of The Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep15
programme.desc: Unintended Bunnyness/Berry'S Pet Threat - Twig accidentally discovers Easter when he gets covered in dryer lint, which makes him look like a bunny while coincidentally stumbling onto a group of hapless eggs that need to be protected from predators. / When Berry forms a close bond with a crow that follows her around like a pet, Rocksy tries to convince Berry that it's only following her around because it's trying to eat her.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Angry Abnormal Atrocities Of The Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abysmal Altercation Of The Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep7
programme.desc: Reign Of Fireworms - Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep8
programme.desc: Crushing It - As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick – who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep14
programme.desc: As The Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble In Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets Lost To Shadow - The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep32
programme.desc: Tailing A Comet - Team Voltron tracks Lotor and his generals to an isolated storage facility where they catch them in the act of stealing a valuable piece of technology

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first “shadowing”/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the “nitting” club

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep32
programme.desc: Super Sherman / Ada Lovelace - When a meteorite crashes into the Penthouse, Sherman transforms into a superhero and things go from bad to worse when Hobson turns into a supervillain

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky And The Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep19
programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird… and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing… until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round… and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions – North, South, East and West – and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What'S My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep43
programme.desc: Tumbleweed Wrangler / The Extreme Bean Machine - Archibald is excited to visit Roxlyn for a western-themed day together in Saddlerock. However, when Saddlerock gets overrun with tumbleweeds, they are determined not to let them spoil their perfect day. / Needing a win, Cousin Ashley enters a road race that features car innovations. With Archibald’s help, Ashley will try to overcome obstacles both mental and physical, all the while driving a car that runs on baked beans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Strange Strife Of The Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Flustering Mindless Woe Of The Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales Of Arcadia Ep45
programme.desc: Parental Guidance - The Trollhunters are paused from action when their parents stage an intervention to get answers from the kids.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales Of Arcadia Ep46
programme.desc: The Oath - The Trollhunters race to stop Gunmar from acquiring a powerful relic, and Jim must do the unthinkable to stop him!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(S) Of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code Of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones’ games, so he makes them a bet that they can’t go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep46
programme.desc: The King And Mrs. Mort - When King Julien gets sick, Mort must attend the Best Kingdom of Madagascar Award ceremony and comes back to find a Queen has taken his place

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky And The Ray Of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky And The Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets / Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. programme.desc: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish - When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep33
programme.desc: Mouse Hunt / David Bushnell - When Sherman leaves a mess in the Penthouse, he and Peabody find a mouse and must catch it before it completely wrecks the show

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep33
programme.desc: Lucky And The Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them ‘as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as… well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey… but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year ‘POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep65
programme.desc: Bumble'S Special Lunch - Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep66
programme.desc: Fifi Misses Me Not - Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen Of The Castle/Truth Or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep701

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Toothpaste Tumble - Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep122

programme.title: Hannah Gadsby's OZ Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - If the Australian art cannon is to be believed this country was founded by an army of pioneer blokes in hats. Hannah picks beneath the paint of this hyper-masculine portrait to uncover a more feminine vision of our country.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Lauren Jackson Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Superstar basketballer Lauren Jackson was born to play the game. She joins Anh to talk about the realities of life as an elite athlete with an international career. Anh hopes to capture her strong persona and femininity.

programme.title: Throwback Ep1

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Continuing his journey in the bustling city of Hanoi, Luke is up bright-and-early to cook one of Vietnam's most famous dishes, pho bo - beef noodle soup with rice noodles.

programme.desc: Sr. 3 - In the final episode of Pacific Island Food Revolution, our teams are tasked with making a healthy feast for our special tasting panel of judges.

programme.title: Connection To Country
programme.desc: Connection to Country follows a group of Indigenous people from the Pilbara as they battle to preserve Australia's unique cultural heritage from the ravages of a booming mining industry.

programme.title: Great Southern Landscapes - Outback Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Art lover Rachel Griffiths treks to Western Arrernte country in central Australia to find the very spot Albert Namatjira painted his 1954 masterpiece of Rutjipma - Mount Sonder. (Final)

programme.title: Hannah Gadsby's OZ Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hannah is still searching for a more inclusive Australian identity in our art. In this episode she enters the NOW! But in post-Cronulla Australian art this Identity seems even harder to define. (Final)

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Sigrid Thornton Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Anh is joined by Australian screen legend Sigrid Thornton for an intimate chat about the people and moments that have shaped her life, worldview and career. Will Anh be able to capture her range and her warmth? (Final)

programme.title: Escape From The City - South Coast NSW: The Wines Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Having downsized to a small Sydney unit, retirees Noni and Stuart are feeling restless. They're keen to find a coastal home which caters to their passions and has ample space for the family to come and visit.

programme.title: Australian Story - The Getting of Wisdom - Hugh van Cuylenburg Ep17
programme.desc: Buried memories and family secrets - how hit podcaster Hugh van Cuylenburg's quest to help people gain a positive mindset took him on his own path of self-discovery and forced him to face some uncomfortable truths.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep51
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Reged Ahmad.

programme.title: Landline Ep20
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Truth or Fake

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep904NamajunasvsZhang2
programme.desc: New York’s Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between “Thug” Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep4
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Sneaky - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2315
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The first time that Mugello hosted a Grand Prix event was in the year 1976, and the layout of the stunning Tuscan circuit, which undulates naturally within a beautiful tree lined valley, has remained practically the same ever since. The track was purchased by Ferrari in 1988 and renovated to their high standards shortly after - with excellent facilities and world class safety features. It became a permanent MotoGP™ venue from 1991 onwards. Italy’s love affair with bike racing is long and enduring. Manufacturers such as Mondial, Moto Guzzi, Gilera, MV Agusta, Morbidelli, Garelli, Cagiva and now Aprilia and Ducati all playing a role, in addition to great riders such as Giacomo Agostini and Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2315
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Prelims - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Main Event - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Main Event - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The first time that Mugello hosted a Grand Prix event was in the year 1976, and the layout of the stunning Tuscan circuit, which undulates naturally within a beautiful tree lined valley, has remained practically the same ever since. The track was purchased by Ferrari in 1988 and renovated to their high standards shortly after - with excellent facilities and world class safety features. It became a permanent MotoGP™ venue from 1991 onwards. Italy’s love affair with bike racing is long and enduring. Manufacturers such as Mondial, Moto Guzzi, Gilera, MV Agusta, Morbidelli, Garelli, Cagiva and now Aprilia and Ducati all playing a role, in addition to great riders such as Giacomo Agostini and Valentino Rossi.
